Hi, my name is Alex.

I am a front-end designer with a passion for crafting beautiful interfaces and delightful experiences.

I am currently a remote designer at ISL where I work on web and mobile applications and am located in beautiful Toledo, OH.

In the past, I've interned at awesome agencies and startups like Viget and Jersey Watch.

This site is built in Jekyll and hosted on Github . Type is set in Inconsolata, Aktiv Grotesk, and Athelas.

© Alex Martinez 2016. Made with ♥ in and around DC, OH
